items.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, pancetta, black pepper
items.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta. Combine all with pepper.

items.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.ingredients: chicken, yogurt, spices, tomato sauce, cream
items.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook with tomato sauce and cream.
